segments.text: My eyes shift to the center-left of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks quite unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful that it might tip over backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is reaching into an open upper cabinet, which I can see contains a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is definitely inside, pulling out cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate with his other hand, perhaps to catch his illicit haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter beneath him is clear, which gave him space to position the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s quite a bold move for such a young child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I observe how his body is stretched upward, completely committed to the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame his determined figure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't give way and cause him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
